response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations. Given its high value and potential impact on your projects, I'm offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a tool that's worth $10,000 to you, at a price that's just $500 less than its perceived value. I look forward to discussing how this product can benefit your endeavors. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 9500}
